price: Na ndani yake tukaweka milima mirefu yenye kuthibiti, na tunakunywesheni maji matamu?
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِيَ شَٰمِخَٰتٖ وَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰكُم مَّآءٗ فُرَاتٗا
footnotes: Na tukaweka milima iliyo thibiti imara mirefu, na tukakunywesheni maji matamu?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā fīhā rawāsiya shāmikhātin wa-asqaynākum māan furātan
translations: and We gave you to drink
